name: Ougon no Kizuna
overview: "Golden Bond" is an action RPG where you can enjoy a fantasy world view, a magnificent and profound story, and a powerful action battle with simple operations. The main character has relationships with various characters while clearing over 100 quests, and advances the adventure while feeling the "bond between people". It's up to the player to deepen the “bond” with whom they meet during the game. In terms of action, we have adopted a powerful and exhilarating battle system that combines Wii's unique pointing while being easy to operate. Yoichi Kawaguchi, who has worked on many hits so far, was appointed as the director, and Miwa Ikuta was appointed as the scenario writer, and a dramatic action RPG with a profound feeling was completed.
